item.title: Krohn-Hite-7008 v2.3.0.18
item.description:
Product: Krohn-Hite-7008 v2.3.0.18
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Fri, 06 Jun 2025 08:48:49 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Drivers and UI for Krohn-Hite 7008 multichannel amplifiers.

Release Notes: [2.3.0]
#14 Support for multiple KH7008 connected to a single host computer
#27 API method to get installed shunt resistor set
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

change getMagnetVector to not open when called

item.title: Transport v1.9.4.16
item.description:
Product: Transport v1.9.4.16
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Wed, 04 Jun 2025 17:07:44 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Transport.lvclass]
Basic transport measurments:
- Lockin vs time (Lockin_time.vi)
- Lockin Sweep Mode (Lockin_sweep.vi)

Release Notes: [1.9.4]
#111 Missing call to Measure: Time
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: Sweep Control v1.2.2.12
item.description:
Product: Sweep Control v1.2.2.12
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Mon, 02 Jun 2025 14:45:59 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: [SweepControl.lvclass]
- Sweep Control.vi:
- Sequencer for stepping multiple parameters. Calls VIs in Transport.lvclass
- Continuous B sweep.vi:
- Sweep B continuously while asynchronously calling VIs in Transport.lvclass

Release Notes: [1.2.2]
#109 update calls to deprecated instruments
#110 fix waitForMagnet tolerance. default is now 1 mT (before was 0)
item.dc:creator: Levylab
